summary: This document is an email from an FBI forensic accountant requesting preparation of a subpoena for JP Morgan Chase Bank. It includes instructions for the subpoena text and specifies where to send the results, indicating an ongoing financial investigation related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant
persons.context: Author of the email requesting preparation of a subpoena for JP Morgan Chase and providing contact information for follow-up.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Contact person listed in the subpoena instructions for JP Morgan Chase to direct questions to regarding the subpoena.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel involved in the same investigation, with the forensic accountant coordinating subpoena preparation and listing the special agent as a contact.

events.title: Subpoena Preparation Request for JP Morgan Chase
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant sends an email requesting preparation of a subpoena for JP Morgan Chase Bank, attaching a rider and providing specific instructions for the subpoena text and contact information.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively pursuing financial records from JP Morgan Chase in October 2019 as part of the Epstein investigation.
The subpoena instructions specify that results should be sent electronically to a Special Agent at the FBI's New York Field Office.
The document indicates coordination between an FBI forensic accountant and a special agent in the investigation.
